name: Time Line (TastiHam)
description:
Physics puzzle where time only moves for linked objects. Control time and momentum to catapult the circles to their destination.

Sorry about the unintuitive controls. Unfortunately I didn't have time to make a tutorial or clear visual and audio feedback. I hope the description helps!

Controls:

LMB - Click a circle to unfreeze it with its stored momentum OR click and drag from one circle to another and release to link them together and unfreeze both.

RMB - Freeze time and break all connections. Momentum is stored in frozen state.

R - Reset the current Puzzle.

Note: Connections can only be made while time is frozen.

This was my first Game Jam ever and I think it's pretty obvious from the state of the game. There are only 4 levels at this point. I wish I had more time to polish this one up, but I hope you get the general idea.

Thanks for playing my little prototype! :)
